chapter.title: About this Document
chapter.para: This document is designed to acquaint new users with the capabilities of the Pegasus Workflow Management System (WMS) and to demonstrate how WMS can solve their scientific computational challenges.

listitem.para: We walk you through a representative workflow project that includes all aspects of the Pegasus WMS.
An introducion to the concepts of workflows, the types of workflows, and how they are used in the Pegasus system
Detailed information about catalog implementation requirements and settings
How to plan an abstract XML workflow and submit it to the DAG to create an executable workflow
How to monitor, debug, and view statistics about the execution of the workflow
Example workflows are included to assist users with becoming familiar with existing workflows to gain insight into creating their own
Advanced information Section with details about configuration details for.....
View a tutorial on Pegasus running on a virtual machine. Users download, install, and operate Pegasus with sample files in a series of exercises
